title: Dependence Day
author: VD
content_html:
I don’t celebrate July 4th. I will happily do so when the united States of America are again free, independent and sovereign. In the meantime, I’ll pass.

So, enjoy the fireworks, anyhow.
content_text:
I don’t celebrate July 4th.  I will happily do so when the united States of America are again free, independent and sovereign.  In the meantime, I’ll pass.
So, enjoy the fireworks, anyhow.
